item.title: Ad blockers hurt the sites you love
item.description: Good point from Ars Technica on ad blockers. This is definitely a problem we have with iusethis.com as well, reducing the total number of ad views reduces our revenue. I much prefer people to use a normal flash blocker. I can understand not wanting cpu consuming ads running in every tab of your browser.
